name: Zoth zombie invasion
description:
Zoth zombie invasion for PlayStation 2

3D survival horror video game, a terrible military virus called zoth has infected the population around the world. You must kill zombies and find the cure.

Game for the Sony PlayStation 2 console. Models and scenes are low polygons, the game was programmed based on the Quake II engine and the Yeti3D engine. It is possible to play it on a real PS2 console that has modchip or Free MCBOOT. It can also be played with the PCSX2 emulator. You can download it from the itch.io store and you can study its source code with the book "Programming for PlayStation 2: for Dummies" written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez, distributed on Google Play Books.
